AC Milan are one of three Italian clubs interested in signing Real Madrid winger Lucas Vazquez, according to a report from Spain.

Calciomercato.it recently reported that that Vazquez is preparing to leave Real Madrid at the end of the season when his contract expires, with Milan and Juventus evaluating a proposal.


According to the latest from Spanish outlet TF, Real Madrid do not seem willing to give in with the Galician winger a new deal. Although he is important for Zidane, Los Blancos consider the offer they tabled to Vazquez a few months ago their best offer and will not increase the salary.

The player is pressing his agents to make sure he does not get a pay cut as he feels he has the confidence of the coach and has always made himself available wherever he is asked to play, including right-back this season.

Vazquez has begun to listen to offers, since he can negotiate with any club that wants to sign him on a free transfer. Napoli, Milan and Roma are mentioned as being interested in signing him, the former being the most advanced in the negotiation. His current salary is €3.5m net per year and he wants at least a three-year deal.

TMW: Thauvin wants to play for AC Milan. The latest

Milan – Thauvin: full speed ahead. The contacts between the Rossoneri and the entourage of the right winger of Olympique de Marseille continue, which lasted since last summer, when the French valued the player at around 15 million euros, but there were doubts about his recovery after the long stop.

Almost all the high-level teams have asked for information, but Thauvin has already given priority to Milan. His current salary is 2.8 million euros and he would not ask for a significant increase for the Rossoneri, precisely because his dream is to play at the San Siro stadium.

The hope is that Thauvin plays in Italy in the next season, the next few weeks will be decisive for eventually signing a pre-contract. In the past months Thauvin has also been associated with Roma, Napoli and Atalanta, as reported by Tuttomercatoweb.com
